title: Survivor(!)

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - On full moons, kill a player who believes in your Folktale.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- All other players begin the game believing in your Folktale. All players are informed they make take the night to stop believing in the folktale, not doing any other actions.
- You know which players believe your Folktale.
- You appear innocent. All your visits are astral.
- When no living players believe in your Folktale anymore, you transform into the Dead Soul Survivor (4350).
- If you fulfill your destiny, you can no longer transform into the Dead Soul Survivor.

fields.name: Destiny:
fields.value: Kill 4 people OR transform into the Dead Soul Survivor.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have each living Peasant fulfill their Destiny.

desc:
Post 4349
*Too late had the campers learned the truth behind the folktale of the survivor. "He's real!"*
